tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_funding_status AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, val.category_value AS funding_status_name, val.id AS funding_status_code FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_funding fund ON fund.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_category_value val ON val.id = fund.funding_status_category_va JOIN amp_category_class c ON c.keyname = 'funding_status' AND c.id = val.amp_category_class_id GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, val.id, val.category_value;;;
